text: Savvas Xiros (born November 30, 1962) is a Greek terrorist and member of November 17. He was arrested on June 29, 2002 at the Piraeus port after a bomb exploded in his hands. He was put on trial in 2003. He was convicted of life imprisonment for murders, robberies, explosions and participation in November 17. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Greek prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment Category:Prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment by Greece Category:Greek criminals Category:Terrorism in Greece Category:Far-left politics Category:People from Florina
